programme.desc: After being released from prison, Chris goes to stay with his younger brother, a police officer.

programme.desc: A bootlegging gang make a run for the American Dream during Prohibition.

programme.desc: A bail bondsman helps a smuggler frame her boss, an arms dealer who plans to kill her.

programme.desc: A pair of aging stickup men try to get the old gang back together for one last hurrah.

programme.title: Destroyer
programme.desc: LAPD detective Erin Bell is placed undercover with a gang in the California desert with tragic results.

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: A boy with facial differences enters fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

programme.desc: Zak runs away from his care home to make his dream of becoming a wrestler come true.

programme.title: Long Shot
programme.desc: A journalist reunites with his childhood crush, now one of the most influential women in the world.

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction
programme.desc: An IRS auditor starts hearing narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life.

programme.title: Swimming with Sharks
programme.desc: After being worn down by his sadistic boss, a long-suffering personal assistant becomes desperate for revenge.

programme.desc: Life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.
